issue.title: Connot compare an array of empty strings to another
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-354](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-354). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As the `data_buffer_` is a `nullptr` in this case, we cannot access it and thus run into a segmentation fault.
